original_text: So the Lord scattered them abroad from thence upon the face of all the earth: and they left off to build the city.
korean_text: 여호와께서 거기서 그들을 온 지면에 흩으셨으므로 그들이 그 도시를 건설하기를 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: So the Lord scattered them abroad from thence
upon the face of all the earth:
and they left off to build the city.
